products.title: Elder Wand
products.description: One of the Deathly Hallows, unbeatable in duel, originally made by Death.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: Amazing power, however, my finger's start looking weird.

products.title: Ravenclaw's Diadem
products.description: The Lost Diadem of Ravenclaw was a sapphire-encrusted tiara, once belonging to Rowena Ravenclaw, the founder of Ravenclaw House. It was said to increase the wearer's wisdom. The diadem was engraved with the quote: 'Wit beyond measure is man's greatest treasure'. According to Pottermore, it was a symbol of Ravenclaw's values of intelligence and wit.

reviews.name: Charlie
reviews.comment: Horrible, almost made my heart stop!

reviews.name: test
reviews.comment: my test

reviews.comment: abc123

reviews.comment: A watch dog could never

reviews.comment: Easy maintaince. If you kill it, it just resurrects

reviews.comment: Hot stuff

products.title: Nosebleed Nougat
products.description: Candy that makes you sick enough to skip class

products.title: Chocolate Frogs
products.description: popular wizarding sweet made from chocolate in the form of a frog. They come with a collectible card of a famous witch or wizard in each pack.

reviews.name: Diana
reviews.comment: bad, hopped away before I could eat it

products.title: Amortentia
products.description: The most powerful love potion known to wizardkind—sniff with caution.

reviews.name: Romilda Vane
reviews.comment: I spilled a drop and now I have three admirers and a stalker. 10/10.

products.title: Every flavour beans
products.description: From marshmallow to earwax—adventure in every bite!

reviews.name: Fred Weasley
reviews.comment: Got soap, grass, and possibly dragon. Worth every Knut.

products.title: Butterbeer soda
products.description: A fizzy twist on a wizarding classic, best served chilled after Quidditch.

reviews.name: Lee Jordan
reviews.comment: Bubbly, sweet, and slightly tipsy after five—delicious!

products.title: Hallows necklace
products.description: An iconic symbol of legend, mystery, and unbeatable fashion.

reviews.name: Luna Lovegood
reviews.comment: Wore it to a Crumple-Horned Snorkack hunt. Felt powerful and stylish!

products.title: Felix felicis
products.description: Liquid luck in a bottle—use wisely (and not before exams).

reviews.name: Horace Slughorn
reviews.comment: Took a sip and won the lottery, found my keys, and ran into Merlin.

products.title: Snowy owl
products.description: Graceful, loyal, and occasionally judgmental—your perfect magical companion.

reviews.name: Seamus Finnigan
reviews.comment: Delivered my letter, stared into my soul, and stole my bacon.

products.title: Veritaserum
products.description: Three drops and even your toad will start confessing its secrets.

reviews.name: Rita Skeeter
reviews.comment: Spilled some on a date. Learned *way* too much. Would recommend.

products.title: Voldemort wand
products.description: Crafted from yew and infused with unsettling energy, this wand hums with the whispers of dark magic. Not recommended for bedtime use.

reviews.name: Lucien
reviews.comment: Sneezed while holding it and accidentally hexed my cat. 10/10, very efficient.

products.title: Oliver Wood wand
products.description: Solid and sporty, this wand is best used for light spells, Quidditch pep talks, and stirring hot cocoa. Built like a broomstick. Kinda.

reviews.name: Penny
reviews.comment: Tried to summon a snitch. Summoned my neighbor’s drone instead. Close enough!

products.title: Zwadderich necklace
products.description: Dark, mysterious, and absolutely cursed—just like your ex.

reviews.name: Draco Malfoy
reviews.comment: Looks great. Possibly haunted. Still wearing it daily.
